summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5444 for the improvement of East Lee Street, from 25th Avenue North to 26th Avenue North; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 68604 as amended by Ordinance No. 69300, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
